entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow mixed with rain beginning early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:03 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow except rain over southern sections. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 08:03 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
